channel.title: The only thing wrong with the majority of rsps
channel.description:
[size=14pt]i love how the following google search http://www.google.com/#hl=en&output=search&sclient=psy-ab&q=rsps+where+you+dont+lose+items+when+you+die&psj=1&oq=rsps+where+you+dont+lose+items+when+you+die&aq=f&aqi=&aql=&gs_sm=3&gs_upl=1672l9933l0l10000l53l50l3l4l4l4l362l6083l12.23.6.1l42l0&bav=on.2,or.r_gc.r_pw.r_qf.,cf.osb&fp=218c0eb2464dee8a&biw=1280&bih=675
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ymmYKhYz5pw[/youtube] 2 days still no links
aka "rsps where you dont lose items when you die"
Yields no relevant results' how about linking me to one; do not post the one where your at g.e. and it take 1600 kills to get barrows gloves and fire cape; and then your shit out of luck when it comes to finding a fight that consists of food and not getting rushed by d claws via a combat handler that looks like this; 70% 100% 70% 100% 0% 100% 70% damage.[/size]
Thanks for not replying, yours truly -Cant find a job
#pimpscapesource

How do you eat or sleep???

haha jk man

loool i have 155 hours game time on it

250 hours on cod and about 100 on bf3
But I would never wanna know how many hours on runescape not counting ps
5000 plus maybe who knows
[/quote]
uber facepalm :p[/quote]
Maybe I do wanna know! But I never will is what I meant, sadly.

item.title: The only thing wrong with the majority of rsps
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades

@Niall

I’m talking about the whole game. Not the levels. I understand you can beat each level within a certain amount of time.

item.source: The only thing wrong with the majority of rsps

item.title: The only thing wrong with the majority of rsps
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“Spades, post:27, topic:433285”][quote author=Niall link=topic=536003.msg3919503#msg3919503 date=1329573392]

I remember having to take a couple days to beat Super Mario Bros. Now, you can buy a game and beat it in a couple of hours.

you can complete super mario bros 1 in 5 minutes, super mario bros 3 in 11 minutes, super mario world in 11ish minutes too

and it’s not a matter of being impatient, it’s a matter of modern games taking the absolute fucking piss in terms of unlocks, played bf3 of a call of duty series lately? I’m 80 hours into battlefield 3 and I’ve got another 40+ hours until I unlock everything before even playing competitively
[/quote]

The achievements I can understand. But I want to go back to the Mario Brothers. NO FUCKING WAY it takes 5 minutes to beat that game. Maybe 1-2 levels in 5 minutes.

[im g]http://images.wikia.com/nintendo/en/images/1/1e/MarioWorldMap.jpg[/img]

But yes, if the players go through and do all the achievements that would take time. But honestly, how often do you hear someone saying they play bf3 or cod to get achievements, most of the time they just run around on multilayer.[/quote]

I’m not talking about achievements, I’m talking about actual guns and unlocks for vehicles that can make or brake a game

for instance, one of the last tank upgrades is reactive armour, trying to go up against a tank with reactive armour is damn near impossible without help from other players

also:



they’re speedruns but whatever

Read full topic
item.source: The only thing wrong with the majority of rsps

item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

erowid:

As it has been mentioned earlier I am not trolling and making my own server is clearly not a suitable option Getting ddosed; and looking for players in an already saturated RSPS scene is #Facepalm anyone who is contact with someone who can contact the owner of a server not featuring Turmoil i am willing to donate 101$ for item loss to be disabled.

There. Now it doesn’t hurt everyone’s eyes.

item.title: The only thing wrong with the majority of rsps
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

[quote=“Spades, post:27, topic:433285”][quote author=Niall link=topic=536003.msg3919503#msg3919503 date=1329573392]

I remember having to take a couple days to beat Super Mario Bros. Now, you can buy a game and beat it in a couple of hours.

you can complete super mario bros 1 in 5 minutes, super mario bros 3 in 11 minutes, super mario world in 11ish minutes too

and it’s not a matter of being impatient, it’s a matter of modern games taking the absolute fucking piss in terms of unlocks, played bf3 of a call of duty series lately? I’m 80 hours into battlefield 3 and I’ve got another 40+ hours until I unlock everything before even playing competitively
[/quote]

The achievements I can understand. But I want to go back to the Mario Brothers. NO FUCKING WAY it takes 5 minutes to beat that game. Maybe 1-2 levels in 5 minutes.

But yes, if the players go through and do all the achievements that would take time. But honestly, how often do you hear someone saying they play bf3 or cod to get achievements, most of the time they just run around on multilayer.[/quote]

I remember when I was in 3rd grade me and my Mom spent months getting to the final castle in the final world, and I took it on the bus for a field trip and this kid reset my account.

Read full topic
item.source: The only thing wrong with the majority of rsps

item.title: The only thing wrong with the majority of rsps
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

[quote=“JavaTC, post:28, topic:433285”][quote author=Spades link=topic=536003.msg3919774#msg3919774 date=1329599354]

I remember having to take a couple days to beat Super Mario Bros. Now, you can buy a game and beat it in a couple of hours.

you can complete super mario bros 1 in 5 minutes, super mario bros 3 in 11 minutes, super mario world in 11ish minutes too

and it’s not a matter of being impatient, it’s a matter of modern games taking the absolute fucking piss in terms of unlocks, played bf3 of a call of duty series lately? I’m 80 hours into battlefield 3 and I’ve got another 40+ hours until I unlock everything before even playing competitively

The achievements I can understand. But I want to go back to the Mario Brothers. NO FUCKING WAY it takes 5 minutes to beat that game. Maybe 1-2 levels in 5 minutes.

[img ]http://images.wikia.com/nintendo/en/images/1/1e/MarioWorldMap.jpg[/img ]

But yes, if the players go through and do all the achievements that would take time. But honestly, how often do you hear someone saying they play bf3 or cod to get achievements, most of the time they just run around on multilayer.
[/quote]
Isn’t that Super Mario world?[/quote]

No, I believe that is Super Mario Bros.

Read full topic
